message: I personally believe Kevin Harvick, should have been black flagged the start before since his vehicle would not shift between first and third gear. He should have been made to either get off the track or start at the end of the longest line. NASCAR knew his vehicle was in trouble but ignored it for the sake of ratings, pure and simple. It is a shame, because they are ruining the sport.

message: I was pro GOP RUBIO, until he started slinging mud like trump and Cruz. I just saw David Duke never endorsed trump, but the media grilled him on it anyways.
